about_the_game:
Created by Riley D. Owens (aka Darkwoulfe), this product consists of 25 top-down uniquely designed, 3d rendered tokens, depicting heroes, villains and monsters. You can use these to replace the letter tokens or built-in tokens in many popular adventure modules. Just unlock the encounters and drag these over top or drag them over top of the listing in your combat tracker.

  • Knight with flamberge
  • Masked Rogue
  • Nyra the Samurai
  • Ronin
  • Northern Fighter
  • High-Elf Paladin
  • Grey Elf Wizard
  • Dwarven Battle Cleric
  • Crimson Hunter
  • Coastal Pirate
  • Armored Ranger
  • Druid with Sickle
  • Bugbears (with club and maul)
  • Hobgoblins (Archer, Axeman, Bludgeoner, Lieutenant, Swordsman, Crossbowman)
  • Deep Lake Creatures (Warrior, Trident and Harpoonsman)

Requires: An active subscription or license of Fantasy Grounds. It will work with any ruleset.
detailed_description:
Created by Riley D. Owens (aka Darkwoulfe), this product consists of 25 top-down uniquely designed, 3d rendered tokens, depicting heroes, villains and monsters. You can use these to replace the letter tokens or built-in tokens in many popular adventure modules. Just unlock the encounters and drag these over top or drag them over top of the listing in your combat tracker.

  • Knight with flamberge
  • Masked Rogue
  • Nyra the Samurai
  • Ronin

Requires: An active subscription or license of Fantasy Grounds. It will work with any ruleset.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
